meanings.definition: A young bird kept in a cage.
meanings.sent1: The cagelings chirped happily in their small home.
meanings.sent2: The cagelings were learning to fly in their cage.
meanings.sent3: The cagelings had a party in their cage, tweeting joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The cagelings longed for the freedom of the open sky.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cagelings filled the cage with life.

meanings.definition: A person or thing confined or restricted in some way.
meanings.sent1: The cagelings of society felt trapped by their circumstances.
meanings.sent2: The cagelings of the forest were hidden from view.
meanings.sent3: The cagelings of the office yearned for a break from work.
meanings.sent4: The cagelings of fear held them back from exploring new things.
meanings.sent5: The cagelings of doubt clouded their judgment.
